entities.name: CHINA STATE ADMINISTRATION FOR MARKET REGULATION
entities.description: Chinese regulatory body formerly known as the State Administration for Industry and Commerce, which began a formal investigation into Microsoft's compliance with China's Anti-Monopoly Law.

entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: A technology company involved in various litigations, including antitrust investigations in China and product-related litigation in the U.S.

entities.name: MICROSOFT MOBILE OY
entities.description: A subsidiary of Microsoft involved in U.S. cell phone litigation.

entities.name: NOKIA
entities.description: A telecommunications company whose Devices and Services business was acquired by Microsoft.
